$Log: euc.elem_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.2 2011-09-07 13:56:14 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags

Revision 1.4 2009/01/16 20:00:04 rsingh04 fixed some more entities and chunking
Revision 1.3 2009/01/15 21:58:10 rsingh04 lots of cleanup to chunking schemes, entities, head tags, etc
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 21:17:14 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:33:11 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.11 2004/06/02 19:16:22 lcerrato missing div for 7.20; added without checking source
Revision 1.10 2004/01/20 17:22:06 dasmith Made DIV types explicit on all elements, since the inheritance behavior didn't survive XML conversion.
Revision 1.9 2003/08/29 19:04:45 lcerrato changed TEI header to reflect correct edition
Revision 1.8 2003/07/01 22:16:08 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.7 2000/10/17 17:40:32 lcerrato fixed numeration problem at book 7 definitions
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:34:30 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/11 00:51:31 dasmith Type all DIVs properly. Write refsDecl that works for whole document.
Revision 1.4 2000/02/10 20:58:15 dasmith Added refsDecl for definitions, etc.
Revision 1.3 1997/12/01 23:05:36 textgod Tagged points and line segments as NUMs.
Revision 1.2 1997/12/01 22:51:02 textgod New header.

div3.p: shmei=o/n e)stin, ou(= me/ros ou)qe/n.
grammh\ de\ mh=kos a)plate/s.
grammh=s de\ pe/rata shmei=a.
eu)qei=a grammh/ e)stin, h(/tis e)c i)/sou toi=s e)f' e(auth=s shmei/ois kei=tai.
e)pifa/neia de/ e)stin, o(\ mh=kos kai\ pla/tos mo/non e)/xei.
e)pifanei/as de\ pe/rata grammai/.
e)pi/pedos e)pifa/neia/ e)stin, h(/tis e)c i)/sou tai=s e)f' e(auth=s eu)qei/ais kei=tai.
e)pi/pedos de\ gwni/a e)sti\n h( e)n e)pipe/dw| du/o grammw=n a(ptome/nwn a)llh/lwn kai\ mh\ e)p' eu)qei/as keime/nwn pro\s a)llh/las tw=n grammw=n kli/sis.
o(/tan de\ ai( perie/xousai th\n gwni/an grammai\ eu)qei=ai w)=sin, eu)qu/grammos kalei=tai h( gwni/a.

o(/tan de\ eu)qei=a e)p' eu)qei=an staqei=sa ta\s e)fech=s gwni/as i)/sas a)llh/lais poih=|, o)rqh\ e(kate/ra tw=n i)/swn gwniw=n e)sti, kai\ h( e)festhkui=a eu)qei=a ka/qetos kalei=tai, e)f' h(\n e)fe/sthken.
a)mblei=a gwni/a e)sti\n h( mei/zwn o)rqh=s.
o)cei=a de\ h( e)la/sswn o)rqh=s.
o(/ros e)sti/n, o(/ tino/s e)sti pe/ras.
sxh=ma/ e)sti to\ u(po/ tinos h)/ tinwn o(/rwn periexo/menon.

ku/klos e)sti\ sxh=ma e)pi/pedon u(po\ mia=s grammh=s periexo/menon h(\ kalei=tai perife/reia, pro\s h(\n a)f' e(no\s shmei/ou tw=n e)nto\s tou= sxh/matos keime/nwn pa=sai ai( prospi/ptousai eu)qei=ai pro\s th\n tou= ku/klou perife/reian
i)/sai a)llh/lais ei)si/n.
ke/ntron de\ tou= ku/klou to\ shmei=on kalei=tai.
dia/metros de\ tou= ku/klou e)sti\n eu)qei=a/ tis dia\ tou= ke/ntrou h)gme/nh kai\ peratoume/nh e)f' e(ka/tera ta\ me/rh u(po\ th=s tou= ku/klou periferei/as, h(/tis kai\ di/xa te/mnei to\n ku/klon.

h(miku/klion de/ e)sti to\ periexo/menon sxh=ma u(po/ te th=s diame/trou kai\ th=s a)polambanome/nhs u(p' au)th=s periferei/as. ke/ntron de\ tou= h(mikukli/ou to\ au)to/, o(\ kai\ tou= ku/klou e)sti/n.

sxh/mata eu)qu/gramma/ e)sti ta\ u(po\ eu)qeiw=n periexo/mena, tri/pleura me\n ta\ u(po\ triw=n, tetra/pleura de\ ta\ u(po\ tessa/rwn, polu/pleura de\ ta\ u(po\ pleio/nwn h)\ tessa/rwn eu)qeiw=n periexo/mena.

tw=n de\ tripleu/rwn sxhma/twn i)so/pleuron me\n tri/gwno/n e)sti to\ ta\s trei=s i)/sas e)/xon pleura/s, i)soskele\s de\ to\ ta\s du/o mo/nas i)/sas e)/xon pleura/s, skalhno\n de\ to\ ta\s trei=s a)ni/sous e)/xon pleura/s.

e)/ti de\ tw=n tripleu/rwn sxhma/twn o)rqogw/nion me\n tri/gwno/n e)sti to\ e)/xon o)rqh\n gwni/an, a)mblugw/nion de\ to\ e)/xon a)mblei=an gwni/an, o)cugw/nion de\ to\ ta\s trei=s o)cei/as e)/xon gwni/as.

tw=n de\ tetrapleu/rwn sxhma/twn tetra/gwnon me/n e)stin, o(\ i)so/pleuro/n te/ e)sti kai\ o)rqogw/nion, e(tero/mhkes de/, o(\ o)rqogw/nion me/n, ou)k i)so/pleuron de/, r(o/mbos de/, o(\ i)so/pleuron me/n, ou)k o)rqogw/nion de/, r(omboeide\s de\ to\ ta\s
a)penanti/on pleura/s te kai\ gwni/as i)/sas a)llh/lais e)/xon, o(\ ou)/te i)so/pleuro/n e)stin ou)/te o)rqogw/nion: ta\ de\ para\ tau=ta tetra/pleura trape/zia kalei/sqw.
para/llhloi/ ei)sin eu)qei=ai, ai(/tines e)n tw=| au)tw=| e)pipe/dw| ou)=sai kai\ e)kballo/menai ei)s a)/peiron e)f' e(ka/tera ta\ me/rh e)pi\ mhde/tera sumpi/ptousin a)llh/lais.

e)a

*e*z kata\ to\ *b, kai\ a)po\ th=s a(fh=s h)=ktai th=| e)faptome/nh| pro\s o)rqa\s h( *b*a, e)pi\ th=s *b*a a)/ra to\ ke/ntron e)sti\ tou= *a*b*g*d ku/klou. h( *b*a a)/ra dia/metro/s e)sti tou= *a*b*g*d ku/klou: h( a)/ra u(po\ *a*d*b gwni/a e)n h(mikukli/w| ou)=sa o)rqh/ e)stin. loipai\ a)/ra ai( u(po\ *b*a*d, *a*b*d mia=| o)rqh=| i)/sai ei)si/n.

tetmh/sqw h( *a*b di/xa kata\ to\ *z, kai\ ke/ntrw| tw=| *z, diasth/mati de\ o(pote/rw| tw=n *z*a, *z*b, ku/klos gegra/fqw o( *a*e*b.

i)/sh: kai\ loiph\ a)/ra h( u(po\ *m*l*n loiph=| th=| u(po\ *e*d*z e)stin i)/sh. i)sogw/nion a)/ra e)sti\ to\ *l*m*n tri/gwnon tw=| *d*e*z trigw/nw|: kai\ perige/graptai peri\ to

kai\ fanero/n, o(/ti, o(/te me

o(/te de\ e)pi\ th=s *b*g eu)qei/as to\ ke/ntron pi/ptei, h( u(po\ *b*a*g gwni/a e)n h(mikukli/w| tugxa/nousa o)rqh/ e)stin: o(/te de\ to\ ke/ntron tou= ku/klou e)kto\s tou= trigw/nou pi/ptei, h( u(po\ *b*a*g e)n e)la/ttoni tmh/mati tou= h(mikukli/ou tugxa/nousa mei/zwn e)sti

e(kate/ra tw=n *b*g, *g*d e(kate/ra| tw=n *a*b, *a*d i)/sh e)sti/n: i)so/pleuron a)/ra e)sti\ to\ *a*b*g*d tetra/pleuron. le/gw dh/, o(/ti kai\ o)rqogw/nion. e)pei\ ga\r h( *b*d eu)qei=a dia/metro/s e)sti tou= *a*b*g*d ku/klou, h(miku/klion a)/ra

*e*a, ai( a)/ra pro\s tw=| *a gwni/ai o)rqai/ ei)sin. dia\ ta\ au)ta\ dh\ kai\ ai( pro\s toi=s *b, *g, *d shmei/ois gwni/ai o)rqai/ ei)sin. kai\ e)pei\ o)rqh/ e)stin h( u(po\ *a*e*b gwni/a, e)sti\ de\ o)rqh\ kai\ h( u(po\ *e*b*h, para/llhlos a)/ra e)sti

kai\ h( *a*g th=| *z*k e)sti para/llhlos. w(/ste kai\ h( *h*q th=| *z*k e)sti para/llhlos. o(moi/ws dh\ dei/comen, o(/ti kai\ e(kate/ra tw=n *h*z, *q*k th=| *b*e*d e)sti para/llhlos. parallhlo/gramma a)/ra e)sti\ ta\ *h*k, *h*g, *a*k, *z*b, *b*k:

kai\ e)fa/yetai tw=n *a*b, *b*g, *g*d, *d*a eu)qeiw=n dia\ to\ o)rqa\s ei)=nai ta\s pro\s toi=s *e, *z, *q, *k gwni/as: ei) ga\r temei= o( ku/klos ta\s *a*b, *b*g, *g*d, *d*a, h( th=| diame/trw| tou= ku/klou pro\s o)rqa\s a)p' a)/kras a)gome/nh e)nto\s pesei=tai tou= ku/klou: o(/per a)/topon e)dei/xqh. ou)k a)/ra o( ke/ntrw| tw=| *h
